Leon's Summer Research Blog NSERC 2020

Week 4

25 May 2020

This week I reviewed the bracket polynomial on tangles. The formula for the bracket of a sum of tangles is pretty nice! I wonder if there is a corresponding formula for multiplication of tangles.

I started drawing immersed curves as well. I am still a bit shaky on the construction, but it seems like a cool invariant for a tangle.
